citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am on
September 18, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Upon arrival to the facility, the
inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file. The inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving
the facility and going to the licensee's business nearby to check their availability. The staff member informed the inspector
both licensees were away from the establishment during this time. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am on 
September 18, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Upon arrival to the facility, the 
inspector attempted to contact the licensee via the phone number on file. The inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving 
the facility and going to the licensee's business nearby to check their availability. The staff member informed the inspector 
both licensees were away from the establishment during this time. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and 
records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
